snippet.title: 《Sdorica》 -sunset- OP Animation
snippet.description:
Rayark X CoMix Wave Films

由雷亞遊戲和CoMix Wave Films協力製作Sdorica片頭動畫，
於12/9 RayarkCon搶先釋出，搭配主題曲「Sdorica＂The Story Unfolds＂」揭開遊戲完整面貌。
透過動畫，可以看到數十位角色的獨特故事，一步步探索凡泰緹大陸過去、現在與未來的歷史。

主題曲「Sdorica＂The Story Unfolds＂」
演唱者-劉軒蓁
作曲/編曲-Hoskey
歌詞-就己

◆ 遊戲下載：https://app.adjust.com/78lhzqs?campaign=Youtube
◆ 二創專區：https://www.facebook.com/groups/2385624698170557/
◆ 官方網站：https://www.sdorica.com/zh/
◆ 官方Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/rayark.sdorica/
◆ 官方Twitter：https://twitter.com/sdorica_rayark

#Sdorica #萬象物語 


Rayark X CoMix Wave Films

A collaboration by Rayark and CoMix Wave Films, the Sdorica opening animation 
was first shown at RayarkCon 2017 and was accompanied by the game's theme song「Sdorica "The Story Unfolds"」.
In the animation, we get to see the unique stories of dozens of characters. With them, we discover the continent of Vendacti's past, present and future. 

Theme Song「Sdorica "The Story Unfolds"」
Singer: Ray Liu
Composer: Hoskey
Lyrics: Joey

◆ Download Link: https://app.adjust.com/78lhzqs?campaign=Youtube
◆ Fan Art Zone: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2385624698170557/
◆ Official Website: https://www.sdorica.com/en/
◆ Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/rayark.sdorica/
◆ Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/sdorica_rayark

#Sdorica
